arts.ttl: Scott Parker delivers Vitor Pereira verdict amid doubts over Wolves future
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira is under immense pressure at Wolves as they look to change their fortunes in the relegation fight, and Scott Parker has delivered his verdict on the 57-year-old. Scott Parker has sympathised with Vitor Pereira’s position but believes things can still turn around for him at Wolves.

arts.ttl: A philosophical Vitor Pereira sends defiant message to Wolves players ahead of Burnley clash
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira sends message to Wolves players ahead of Burnley clash But Vitor Pereira is determined to get something from this game, and has issued a defiant – and also philosophical – message to his players.

arts.ttl: Burnley XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Burnley travel to Molineux on Sunday, aiming to build on a vital victory last weekend that lifted them out of the relegation zone. Scott Parker’s side secured a crucial 2-0 win over fellow promoted team Leeds United. Consequently, they will be looking to carry that momentum into this clash against the Premier League’s bottom club. arts.ttl: Wolves vs Burnley – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Wolves host Burnley in a crucial relegation battle at Molineux on Sunday, with the home side still searching for their first Premier League win of the season. Wolves sit rock bottom after failing to win any of their opening eight games for the second consecutive season. Conversely, Burnley arrive boosted by a vital victory over […] The post Wolves vs Burnley – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Burnley: Pre-match Analysis
arts.sum: With Wolves likely to setup in similar fashion it's important for Burnley to matchup in a man to man system as they will need to win that midfield battle if they want to walk away from Molineux with all three points. This game is set between two teams trying to battle against relegation with the hosts, Wolverhampton Wanderers, currently squandering at the foot of the Premier League table with just two points their name as they are yet to pick up a win this season in the league.

arts.ttl: Opta supercomputer predicts likelihood of Wolves getting first Premier League win vs Burnley
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira’s job is no doubt under pressure, and if the Old Gold end the weekend nine games without a win, then the already pessimistic fanbase will truly start to think about Championship football next season. Wolves have to beat Burnley to give themselves any chance of an escape from the relegation zone, and the Opta supercomputer has given their prediction of if that will happen.

arts.ttl: The Scott Parker statistic that gives Wolves a reason for hope ahead of Burnley clash
arts.sum: Scott Parker has faced Wolves on three separate occasions as a Premier League manager, and his history against the Old Gold suggests a positive result on Sunday could be likely. However, Scott Parker seemingly does not have a great time playing Wolves, and that could provide some much-needed hope for fans ahead of the game.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Burnley injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash between Wolves and Burnley.

arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira provides updates on Jorgen Strand Larsen and Wolves duo ahead of Burnley
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has provided team news for Wolves’ home tie against Burnley in his pre-match press conference. Pereira has updated us on squad fitness ahead of Sunday’s clash.
